title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 636-2.5 - Heightened Scrutiny
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 636-2.5 - Heightened Scrutiny

State Regulations
A Medicaid HCBS setting subject to heightened scrutiny, as
defined in subdivision
636-2.3
(c) of
this Subpart, will be reviewed in the form and format specified by CMS, DOH, and/or OPWDD. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
§§
636-2.5

Adopted

New

York State Register May 29, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 22, eff. 5/29/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
